messages.message:
Hi team,
Getting this error during startup of webapp, can someone guide me on this?
`ERROR: failed to solve: process "/bin/sh -c apk add --no-cache         bash         coreutils         curl         libldap         libltdl         libmagic         libstdc++         libxslt         xmlsec         \"libprotobuf=~3.21.12\"" did not complete successfully: exit code: 2`

cc:  @Balaram
This looks more like an issue with our `protobuf` version, also seen here https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CCY413CSU/p1749520432120299?thread_ts=1749519109.141409&cid=CCY413CSU

Has anyone tried upgrading the version or any idea on which version shall we upgrade it to ?
> `build-docker` works after the upgrade, but `run-docker` failed. Seems like we need to upgrade protobuf...
@abhijnan Have we updated it in webapp or was the support dropped for the version we were using from the source itself?
I tried upgrading the protobuf recently to the latest version and found some blockers. If necessary we should be able to upgrade protobuf to 4.x
